summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Seventeenth Avenue South, from Forest Street to Massachusetts Street; Sixteenth Avenue South, from Beacon Avenue to Holgate Street; Fifteenth Avenue South, from Beacon Avenue to Grand Street; Thirteenth Avenue South, from College Street to Grand Street; College Street, from Thirteenth Avenue South to Fourteenth Avenue South; and Lander Street, from Seventeenth Avenue South to Twenty-first Avenue South, all in The City of Seattle, by constructing water mains therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all gates tees, crosses and fire hydrants necessary for the proper fire protection and water service of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1481 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
